attributes.action: STOP BARNET COUNCIL FROM CLOSING OUR CHILDRENS AFTER SCHOOL CLUB .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 3rd April 2009 Barnet council is going to closedown the after-school club used by pupils from Hollickwood School and Coppetts Wood schools in Muswell Hill to save £46,000 per year.
The government promised to provide more after-school clubs to encourage parents to go back to work.
This club is used by the poorest working parents in the borough who will now have to give up work to look after their children after school ;costing the government and the council more in benefits.
Can you please intervene and save our after-school club from closure.
Only 3 week left to save us.
Thanks.
